title: GemCaveToken
author: GemCaveToken
content: Gemcave token is a Utility Network with a number of different platformsHere is a brief summary of GemCave Token's utilitiesüí´Utilities Listüí´üü¢ 1 - NFT Platform (new tech) 5000/5000 V1 NFTs minted, V2 NFTs out this month!üü¢ 2 - Coin Listing Siteüü¢ 3 - Rewards Platform - Integrated into the smart contractüü¢ 4 - Gaming Platform - P2E Gaming free to playüü¢ 5 - Swap Platform - Staking out this month!There is lots to digest with all these different utilities.WHAT'S THE 'NEW NFT TECH'?‚úÖ Stored ON-CHAIN‚úÖ Permanent + Secure‚úÖ Born ON-CHAIN‚úÖ Fully CompliantThe first REAL NFTs in the BSC-space.Read this medium articlehttps://medium.com/@gemcavecoin/gemcave-token-defi-project-solves-inherent-security-risks-of-all-nfts-with-its-new-smart-19cd68ede7a7 to find out more about our NFT technology.üçûHow to mint/bake an NFT ü•êOur NFTs are minted either by using an NFT credit earned through our rewards platform or by minting the NFT through our NFT platform, which burns of a set amount of GEMS tokens. See our website for GEMS required to mint an NFT.This process will be done through our website - More info to come on this closer to the release. See the website for a LIVE countdown timer! token.gemcave.orgCOIN LISTING SITEThe BSC-Gem Listing Site, Gemcave.org, is one of GemCave Token's key utilities.BSC Projects with high potential can be listed on GemCave.org, submissions can be done by anyone and a member of the GemCave team vets the smart contract and general project concept, if we like what we see, we will approve your submission!REWARDS PLATFORMOur Rewards Platform is full of special rewards, integrated into our custom created smart contract!Gem Rewards Available:Free NFT Credit: These allow you to bake your very own NFT through our NFT Platform for free!!Tax Free Buy Credits: Credits your account with a tax free BUY on the next BUY you do of GEMS tokens! Winnable through our GemCave Gaming Platform.To see what Gems Rewards you have, check your wallets rewards on our website, as shown above!GAMES PLATFORMGemCave Gaming Platform LIVE! üü¢ 3 Dapp features available to play and earn!The GemCave Gaming Platform is a gaming platform playable for FREE exclusively to GEMS holders.üéØ Holders play for free every 12 hours!Check the website for the latest prizes!Spin the whee, Gem Miner and the Claw Game! Free to play now!Join our telegram and chat with the team or checkout the website at Token.Gemcave.orgTelegram: https://t.me/GemCaveOfficial

comments.author: Brandibaby23
comments.body: Gemcave is amazing! It's is holding it down in this market! Devs are top notch! Great utilities! Fun Games!! Loving this project!!

comments.author: Unionguy8
comments.body: Hyper utility token, excellent project with innovative and active Dev team. Community is the absolute best. Low MC with in house on chain staking soon.

comments.author: TK710420
comments.body: Im all about GemCave. When I heard they are minting and storing NFTs onto the blockchain, I was interested from that point on. To go along with that, GemCave is backed by some solid utilities (Listing site, P2E games, swap platform, and staking coming soon. Currently being farmed by FarmerDoge & partnered with DiversiFi, all 3 projects aim to deliver 100% transparency to their community. As an investor, I like updates & hearing from the developers. Take a few minutes of your day to look into this project.
